summary.span: 表示一个文档查看控件，该控件可以承载分页的 内容，例如 。

span.span: Represents a document viewing control that can host paginated content such as an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 自定义 DocumentViewer 控件Customizing the DocumentViewer Control 若要对多个控件应用相同的属性设置 ，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认值 ，为控件指定独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息 ，请参阅 [通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). 若要查看特定于的部分和状态 ，请参阅 [DocumentViewer 样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/documentviewer-styles-and-templates)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [DocumentViewer Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/documentviewer-styles-and-templates). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)]

span.span: WPF Controls Gallery Sample

summary.span: 将文档内容缩小一个缩放级别。

span.span: Zooms out of the document content by one zoom step.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面是缩放级别增量。The following are the zoom level increments. `5% 100% 1200%` `10% 125% 1600%` `25% 150% 2000%` `33% 175% 2400%` `50% 200% 3200%` `66% 300% 4000%` `75% 400% 5000%` `800%` 最小缩放级别为5%。The minimum zoom level is 5%. 达到最小缩放级别后，将 不再产生任何影响。After the minimum zoom level is reached, has no more effect. `false` 当达到最小缩放级别时，属性将返回。The property returns `false` when the minimum zoom level is reached.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ExtentHeight As Double
public: property double ExtentHeight { double get(); };

summary.span: 获取分页文档的整体垂直高度。

span.span: Gets the overall vertical height of the paginated document.

value.span: 以与设备无关的像素指定的分页内容的整体垂直高度。

span.span: The overall vertical height of the paginated content specified in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值为 0.0。

span.span: The default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于垂直页面排列， 是所有页面高度之和，包括页面之间的空间。For vertical page arrangements, is the sum of all the page heights and includes the space between pages. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取分页文档的整体水平宽度。

span.span: Gets the overall horizontal width of the paginated document.

value.span: 内容布局区域的当前水平宽度，以与设备无关的像素为单位。

span.span: The current horizontal width of the content layout area specified in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值为 0.0。

span.span: The default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于水平页面排列， 是所有页面宽度之和，包括页面之间的空间。For horizontal page arrangements, is the sum of all the page widths and includes the space between pages. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double HorizontalOffset { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.HorizontalOffset : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置水平滚动条位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal scroll position.

value.span: 采用与设备无关的像素指定的当前水平滚动位置。

span.span: The current horizontal scroll position specified in device independent pixels.

value.span: 初始默认值是 0.0。

span.span: The initial default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性将导致 控件滚动到指定的水平偏移量。Setting the property causes the control to scroll to the specified horizontal offset. 从可见内容区域的左边缘测量水平偏移量。The horizontal offset is measured from the left edge of the visible content area. 在中设置此属性时 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，不能使用单元限定符 (例如 `in` 或 `cm`) 为其他许多 "Width" 或 "水平" 属性启用的。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Width" or "Horizontal" properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

span.span: The value specified to set is negative.

member this.HorizontalPageSpacing : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置页面之间的水平间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal space between pages.

value.span: 所显示页面之间的水平间距，以与设备无关的像素为单位。

span.span: The horizontal space between displayed pages specified in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值为 10.0。

span.span: The default is 10.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性会调整页面之间的水平间距。Setting the property adjusts the horizontal spacing between pages. 在中设置此属性时 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，不能使用单元限定符 (例如 `in` 或 `cm`) 为其他许多 "Width" 或 "水平" 属性启用的。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Width" or "Horizontal" properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: The value specified to set is negative.

summary.span: 创建并返回此 控件的 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double VerticalOffset { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.VerticalOffset : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置垂直滚动条的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical scroll position.

value.span: 当前垂直滚动条的位置偏移量，以与设备无关的像素为单位。

span.span: The current vertical scroll position offset in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值为 0.0。

span.span: The default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须设置为非负值偏移值。 must be set with non-negative offset values. 设置负值会引发 异常。Setting a negative value raises an exception. 垂直偏移量从可见内容区域的顶部进行测量。The vertical offset is measured from the top of the visible content area. 在中设置此属性时 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，不能使用单位限定符 (例如 `in` 或 `cm`) 为其他许多 "Height" 或 "Vertical" 属性启用的。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Height" or "Vertical" properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double VerticalPageSpacing { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.VerticalPageSpacing : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置显示页面之间的垂直间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical spacing between displayed pages.

value.span: 显示页面之间的垂直间距，以与设备无关的像素为单位。

span.span: The vertical space between displayed pages in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值为 10.0。

span.span: The default is 10.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性会将 页面之间的垂直间距调整为指定值。Setting the property adjusts the vertical spacing between pages to the specified value. 该值必须为非负数。The value must be non-negative. 如果将此属性设置为负值，则会引发 异常。Setting this property to a negative value will raise an exception. 在中设置此属性时 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，不能使用单位限定符 (例如 `in` 或 `cm`) 为其他许多 "Height" 或 "Vertical" 属性启用的。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Height" or "Vertical" properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调整视图大小并排列视图，以显示每个页面的缩略图预览。 sizes and arranges the view to display a thumbnail preview of each page. 下表显示了与此命令关联的键盘快捷键。The following table shows the keyboard shortcut key associated with this command. ||| |-|-| |快捷键Shortcut Key|内容[none]|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Zoom { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Zoom : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置文档缩放百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets the document zoom percentage.

value.span: 缩放百分比表示为 5.0 到 5000.0 之间的一个值。

span.span: The zoom percentage expressed as a value, 5.0 to 5000.0.
The default is 100.0, which corresponds to 100.0%.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将导致 控件缩放到指定的值。Setting this property causes the control to zoom to the specified value. 属性的值必须介于5.0 到5000.0 之间 (包含) ，这对应于百分比范围5.0% 到5000.0%。The property must be a value between 5.0 to 5000.0 (inclusive), which corresponds to a percentage range 5.0% to 5000.0%. 需要布局更新的操作或命令可更改 属性设置。Actions or commands that require a layout update may change the property setting. 例如，更改的值 、调用 方法或调用 会导致 设置更改。For example, changing the value of , calling the method, or invoking the can cause the setting to change. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||
